ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The intercession of the interceders will not help them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So, the intercession of intercessors will not avail them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: The intercession of the intercessors shall then be of no avail to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The intercession of the intercessors will be of no benefit to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So the intercession of the intercessors will not benefit them. (The disbelievers will not have any intercessor.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So no intercession of intercessors will be of any use to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So the intercession of intercessors shall not avail them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then the intercession of the intercessors shall not profit them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: The mediation of no mediators will avail them then.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: So no intercession will avail them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then there will not Profit them intercision of the interceders,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So the intercession of the intercessors will not avail them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then will no intercession of (any) intercessors profit them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So no intercession of intercessors will be of any use to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: The intercession of their intercessors shall not benefit them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But the intercession of intercessors will not help them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So there will not benefit them the intercession of [any] intercessors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [74:48] Thus the intercession of the intercessors, from among the angels, the prophets and the righteous, will not avail them, in other words, there will be no intercession for them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (The mediation of no mediators will avail them then) Allah says: the intercession of the angels, prophets and 709 righteous ones will not benefit them.
